name: Genesis
description: We offer a complete range of solutions for companies small to mid-size to manage human resources, control costs, retain good people, cope with regulation and achieve solid growth.Our mission is to be an ideal HR partner and trusted advisor – caring, responsive, expert, and integral to your success.
features: Give a chance to handicapped individuals
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Empowering your business to thrive, one employee at a time
ShortDescription: Genesis HR Solutions has been a long-proven, regional HR partner that cares deeply about their client businesses and their employees.
enhanced_description: Genesis offers a comprehensive range of HR solutions, combining software and services, designed for small to mid-size companies. Established in 1991, they operate as a regional HR partner and trusted advisor, focusing on core human resources management, cost control, employee retention, regulatory compliance, and fostering solid business growth. Their offerings span key HR functions including talent management, recruiting, total rewards, employee scheduling, time tracking, payroll, and staffing services. Genesis emphasizes a strategic HR partnership approach, delivering personalized solutions and supporting inclusive hiring practices, particularly by providing opportunities for handicapped individuals.
competitive_advantages: Long-proven track record and extensive experience (since 1991)
Regional HR expertise and dedicated client care
Focus on inclusive hiring practices (e.g., supporting handicapped individuals)
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient talent acquisition
Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity
Support for achieving solid business growth
primary_users: Business Owners (for small/mid-size companies utilizing outsourced HR)
